sentence: Fringe candidate Doug Mastriano has been enthusiastically endorsed by former President Donald Trump and appears likely to prevail in the primary on Tuesday.
author: Sarah K. Burris
title: Republicans are already accepting defeat in Pa. governor's race -- and are looking for someone to blame

sentence: With far-right state Sen. Doug Mastriano on the verge of capturing the Pennsylvania GOP gubernatorial nomination, Republicans are lashing out, furious that he could cost them a shot at a competitive race in the perennial swing state.
title: GOP blame game erupts in Pennsylvania governor's race
